name: Charge (Victoria Vera Vigaray, Leonor Cuesta)
description:
Winner Best Looking InDev GameJam  (2018)

A game made in 48 hours (less, actually, about 30) for a Game Jam arranged by InDev student organisation in Nord Universitet (Steinkjer, Norway). 

Art and sounds are made by me (Victoria Vera Vigaray), code by Leonor Cuesta. We made the game design together. We had a lot of fun doing this, so we will probably keep updating it with more stuff!
